subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Softball
lead_paragraph: The Americans trailed Canada, 1-0, when play was suspended because of rain and lightning, setting up a day in which they will have to play both of their toughest challengers.
snippet: The Americans trailed Canada, 1-0, when play was suspended because of rain and lightning, setting up a day in which they will have to play both of their toughest challengers.
